analysis.description:
Reentrancy in HoldPresaleContract.unlockTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#357-377):
	External calls:
	- OppToken.transfer(msg.sender,holderList[contributor].tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#369-374)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderList (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#371-373)

OpportyPresale.getTokensBack (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#551-559) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#558-559)

Reentrancy in OpportyPresale.sendTokensToHold (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#538-551):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getBalanceContract() >= tokenRaised) (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#543-544)
	- token.transfer(holdContract,tokenRaised) (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#545-551)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensTransferredToHold (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#546-547)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/8/0xca67e92833c2de6bf3a444127fa0c60092255bf4.sol#1): it allows old versions
